medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began soon after she arrived at work that morning, when threatened by a parent. Improved with rest immediately after the event but worsened by the end of the day.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of well-controlled hypertension. Only medication was lisinopril, 5 mg daily.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked approximately five cigarettes daily for 30 years, rarely drank alcohol, and reported no illicit drug use.
